div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 232px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: This grant is used by web and native apps and requires a user-agent to support the redirect flow.
